summary: The document is a memorandum concerning the Garrison Investigation under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It outlines the CIA's review of a subject's file, detailing their recruitment in October 1962, participation in an infiltration operation in May 1963, and subsequent termination. The document also provides a list of staff and agent personnel who interacted with the subject and highlights the absence of records regarding the subject's activities between October and December 1963.
key_findings: The subject was recruited by the CIA in October 1962, correcting previous reports of 1960.
The subject was involved in an infiltration operation in May 1963 and was terminated soon after.
A detailed list of staff and agent personnel who had contact with the subject is included.
There are no records documenting the subject's activities or whereabouts from October to December 1963.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act
